name: hydrogenPreset import path mismatch
description: The hydrogenPreset function must be imported from '@shopify/hydrogen/react-router-preset', NOT '@shopify/hydrogen/vite'. The /vite subpath only exports the 'hydrogen' vite plugin. Using the wrong import causes 'hydrogenPreset is not a function' error during react-router typegen or vite build.

trigger.errorMessage: TypeError: (0 , __vite_ssr_import_0__.hydrogenPreset) is not a function when running react-router typegen or vite build
